about.title: cat about.txt
about.p1: I am a DevOps passionate about automation, continuous improvement, and collaborative culture. My goal is to build efficient CI/CD pipelines, optimize infrastructures, and facilitate the delivery of high-quality software in an agile and reliable way.
about.p2: I specialize in infrastructure as code and API Managers, with experience in tools such as Terraform, Crossplane, WSO2, Kong, and Apigee. I also have knowledge in containerization, container orchestration, and deployment automation. I seek to integrate into teams where I can learn, grow, and add value from day one.

items.title: Multi-language deployment automation on Kubernetes
items.description: Through GitLab CI/CD pipelines, I implemented an automated project deployment system on Kubernetes. From a frontend, users uploaded code in multiple languages (Java, React, Python, Node.js, Vue, .NET, among others) and the pipeline automatically executed: security and vulnerability analysis, application containerization, deployment to Kubernetes cluster, Ingress creation, and subdomain registration on Cloudflare. System designed to deploy code challenges on a platform dedicated to technical evaluations.

items.title: Infrastructure creation from scratch for fintech
items.description: Using Terraform, I deployed a complete infrastructure from scratch on Azure for an online financial management system. The project included: Kubernetes clusters, database servers, bastions, FTP servers, blob storage, deployment and configuration of WSO2 API Manager, GitLab pipelines for API deployment, monitoring setup (Prometheus, Loki, Pingdom), and mailing service with Amazon SES. Complete and scalable production infrastructure for financial operations.

items.title: Centralized multi-tenant monitoring system
items.description: I designed and implemented a centralized multi-tenant monitoring system capable of receiving telemetry from multiple sources and clients in an isolated and secure way. Using Mimir for metrics, Loki for logs, Alloy as a collection agent, and Grafana as a visualization interface, I managed to consolidate observability from different datasources including: Kubernetes clusters, virtual machines, databases, API managers, and distributed applications. Scalable system with tenant data segregation, customized dashboards, and automated alerting.

items.title: Infrastructure support with Crossplane
items.description: I worked on Azure infrastructure for a multinational that uses Crossplane for cloud resource deployment and management. I managed Crossplane templates developed in Rust and GitOps manifests in YAML, ensuring the proper functioning of declarative infrastructure and automated provisioning flows. Hands-on experience with Kubernetes control plane and multi-cloud infrastructure management.
